statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_phone, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%son%' OR customer_email LIKE '%@yahoo.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY date_purchased DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, car_model, price FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT car_model, price FROM purchases WHERE date_purchased >= '2022-01-01' AND price > 50000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, p.car_model, p.date_purchased FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id ORDER BY p.date_purchased ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT make, model, year FROM cars WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, amount_paid FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, make, model, amount_paid FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE amount_paid > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM cars WHERE year > 2010 AND price < 20000;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, amount_paid FROM purchases WHERE amount_paid > 5000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT c.make, p.amount_paid, p.purchase_date FROM cars c JOIN purchases p ON c.car_id = p.car_id WHERE p.amount_paid > 10000;
SELECT * FROM customer_info;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT car_make, car_model, car_year FROM car_inventory WHERE price < 25000;
SELECT customer_id, car_id, purchase_date FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM dealership_location WHERE zipcode LIKE '90%' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_info WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT car_make, car_model, car_year FROM car_inventory WHERE price > 20000;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_price FROM purchase_history JOIN customer_info ON purchase_history.customer_id = customer_info.customer_id;
SELECT location_name, address, city, state, zipcode FROM dealership_location WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT make, model, year, price FROM cars WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT purchase_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, ca.make, ca.model, p.purchase_date FROM purchases p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN cars ca ON p.car_id = ca.car_id;
SELECT s.name AS salesperson_name, d.name AS dealer_name, s.commission FROM salespeople s JOIN dealers d ON s.dealer_id = d.dealer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' OR last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT car_id, make, model, year, price FROM cars WHERE available = TRUE ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT name, location FROM dealers WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT salesperson_id, name, commission FROM salespeople WHERE commission > 1000 ORDER BY commission DESC;
